name: Chuck E. Cheese: Skate Universe
summary:
Grab a skateboard and help Chuck E. Cheese shred some sidewalk in Chuck E.’s Skate Universe.

See how far you can skate as Chuck E. attempts to go for the ultimate distance record. The only limit is what you can get away with! Help Chuck E. hop, dodge, and duck obstacles along the way.

Earn points by picking up the Golden Pizzas and other objects.

Plus, you can unlock some sweet gear along the way – insane items like “The Giant Pickle Board” or “The Tongue” – you’ll have to skate them to believe them. See how you rank on the Leaderboards where you can try to beat Chuck E. Cheese super star friends, like Helen Henny and Mr. Munch!
